channel.title: Why dont fire capes and fury's work in my server?
channel.description:
when i type ::item 6570 (that is the fire cape id) a fire cape is on the floor. the when i pick it up it becomes an obby maul on note. when i type ::pickup 6570 i have fire cape in my inventory. when i put it on.......lagg! wonbt let me in anymore. when i logg in again it logs out immediatly :confused:the same happends with fury's obby stuff white armour and lots more :(
plz some1 help me cuz i want fire capes and fury's!

item.title: Why dont fire capes and fury's work in my server?
item.dc:creator: @boarding_on_java boarding on java
item.description:
@boarding_on_java wrote:

you have to be an admin to use ::pickup

Read full topic
item.source: Why dont fire capes and fury's work in my server?
